project.name: program-runtime-parent
project.description: Parent for Programs processor and Map Reduce pipeline artifacts. This project encompasses all apis and implementations of various Processors, Retrievers and utility commands that are used for Program Runtime and program runtime integration tests.

project.name: program-runtime-api
project.description: This module contains apis of various Processors that are used for Program Runtime.

project.name: program-runtime-test
project.description: This module contains test helpers and artifacts to assist unit testing.

project.name: program-runtime-common
project.description: This module provides a simple API for creating ProgramDev models, which are primarily used for Program Runtime. This module contains core business logic in the construction of the models.

project.name: crunch-catalog
project.description: Data catalog and process definition support for Apache Crunch.

project.name: program-runtime-retriever
project.description: This module contains implementations of various Retrievers that are used for Program Runtime.

project.name: program-runtime-ada
project.description: This module contains implementations of various Processors that are used for Program Runtime.

project.name: program-runtime-pipeline
project.description: This module contains implementations of various map reduce pipelines that are used for Program Runtime.
This module contains implementations of various utility commands that are used for Program Runtime.
